lines.text: A dress must always reveal enough.Just enough to tease men.
He's studying sea birds' sexual mores.Did you know they invented the stag party?
He's studying sea birds' sexual mores.Did you know they invented the stag party?
I thought Jean only lent you out all the better to keep you.He let you make love to whomever you wished, but he was in control.
One must suffer for beauty.
...the first time I surprised my parents while they were making love.
How old were you?
The brave have no age.
When I want something, I say so.
That simplifies things.
Love is the only thing that interests me.
I wouldn't want the woman I love to make love to someone else.
You prefer lying?
In this case, yes.
You're quite bourgeois, after all.
Loving someone who loves you is so very rare.
What's this dance?
It's called Sega.
I've heard of a dance ending in an orgy.
That's the Moutia. Much more primitive, more like a happening.
When people drink, it degenerates.
